title: Plants make food. - 2nd ed.
brief_description: An elementary film using animation, photomicrography and live-action experiments on photosynthesis showing how plants make food. Explains the functioning of roots, stems and leaves and explains the transforming of water, minerals and carbon dioxide into foods. Also covers the roles of chlorophyll and sunlight. Suitable for upper primary level.
